Translations.Text: Arraz nnsen, ar Mass nnsen, d leonanat n Aaden, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen, i lebda. Oebbi Iouva ten, nitni ouvan T. Akka i win i ippagwaden Mass is
U tessuffe$ ed d tmurt, tiaakkwemin is
amdan ad yini: "d acu p iu$en
A d teeku tidyanin is, assen
akken i s Iweeea Mass ik
Assen, a d asen imdanen, d igrawen, ar usnaati igiten nnsen
Win ixedmen taeeyt ubelkim n lxio, a t ieeo
Win ixedmen taeeyt ubelkim n cceoo, a t ieeo
Ih, amdan, i Mass is, d lkaraa
U neppa, ard anagi n waya
Neppa, s tidep, aias i ieemmel saaya
Day ur ieoi ara ar mara d iffe$ i illan deg ieekwan
